e: ￹`O~ `paliw~ `ako~ `cingra~ `a~ `mi~`panay~.￺He is my partner in harvesting the grain.￻他是我們割稻的夥伴
￹`Ma~`pa~`paliw~ `kita~ `a~ `mi~`panay~.￺Let's take turns helping in each others' fields harvesting (no wages given but reciprocal labor).￻我們以輪流的方式相互幫忙割稻
d.f: ￹￺to help each other with field work￻輪流相互幫忙田裡的工作
